sql-tuning-task
***************


Description
===========

sql Tuning Tasks


Available Commands
==================

* clone

* clone-with-pwd

* clone-with-secret

* drop

* drop-with-pwd

* drop-with-secret

* get-exec-plan-stats-compare

* get-sql-exec-plan

* get-summary-report

* list-findings

* list-recommendations

* list-tasks

* start

* start-with-pwd

* start-with-secret
